statuses.message: Starting December 24th, the server will be undergoing routine maintenance.  This is expected to last around 2 hours.  During this time, operations such as creating or updating logs or pool settings, or adding new pools will result in an error.  Thank you for your patience!
statuses.title: Scheduled Maintenance

all.title: App Update Required
all.message: Please update to the latest version of Pool Math in the app store to continue...
